entries.name: new(io)
entries.desc: Creates a new TarWriter, yielding it if a block is given

entries.name: new(io)
entries.desc: Creates a new TarWriter that will write to io

entries.name: add_file(name, mode)
entries.desc: Adds file name with permissions mode, and yields an IO for writing the file to

entries.name: add_file_digest(name, mode, digest_algorithms)
entries.desc: Adds name with permissions mode to the tar, yielding io for writing the file.  The digest_algorithm is written to a read-only name.sum file following the given file contents containing the digest name and hexdigest separated by a tab.

entries.name: add_file_signed(name, mode, signer)
entries.desc: Adds name with permissions mode to the tar, yielding io for writing the file.  The signer is used to add a digest file using its digest_algorithm per #add_file_digest and a cryptographic signature in name.sig.  If the signer has no key only the checksum file is added.

entries.name: add_file_simple(name, mode, size)
entries.desc: Add file name with permissions mode size bytes long.  Yields an IO to write the file to.

entries.name: add_symlink(name, target, mode)
entries.desc: Adds symlink name with permissions mode, linking to target.

entries.name: check_closed()
entries.desc: Raises IOError if the TarWriter is closed

entries.name: mkdir(name, mode)
entries.desc: Creates a new directory in the tar file name with mode
